metadata.name: Jean-Marc Pillot Chassagne-Montrachet Les Vergers 2005
metadata.description:
Country : France
Region : Burgundy, Chassagne-Montrachet 1er (Premier) Cru 'Les Vergers'
Type : White
Vintage : 2005
Blend : 100% Chardonnay
Alcohol ABV : 13.5%
Sweetness : Dry
Domaine Jean-Marc Pillot is a wine producer based in Chassagne-Montrachet, in Burgundy's CÃ´te de Beaune subregion.
It is particularly associated with white wines from the Chardonnay grape, although it also makes reds from Pinot Noir in both Chassagne and neighboring Santenay.
The estate is formally known as Domaine Jean Pillot.
Jean-Marc, whose name features more prominently on the labels, took over from his father Jean in 1991.
